title.rendered: Aqualis ASA: Mandatory notification of trade

content.rendered:
Asker, 18 February 2016: The following primary insiders have purchased shares in Aqualis ASA

Kim Boman, CFO, acquired 400 000 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 2.5 per share. Total holding after this transaction is 400 000 shares.

This information is subject to the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.
